channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: John Roberts’ Tacit Endorsement Of Judicial Supremacy Is Undermining SCOTUS
item.description: Roberts fails to understand that SCOTUS's continued allowance of leftists' judicial coup is undermining Americans' faith in the judiciary.

item.title: 80 Years After The Allies Won World War II, U.S. Taxpayers Are Funding European Authoritarianism
item.description: The United States has protected and bailed out Europe for far too long.

item.title: V-E Day Should Be a Day of Celebration, Not Solemn Remembrance
item.description: America’s irreplaceable contribution to winning that world war and preventing another deserves to be the object of adoration.

item.title: Trump considers tax hike on Americans making $2.5 million or more per year
item.description: President Donald Trump is considering a tax hike for the wealthy, Fox News Digital was told.

item.title: More Fizzle Than Sizzle at the Met Gala
item.description: Despite high points, a race-driven event leads to a flashy sameness.

item.title: Bitcoin reclaims $100,000 as Trump announces trade deal with the UK
item.description: Bitcoin gained 5% after Trump announced he would roll back some tariffs on the U.K.

item.title: Biden takes responsibility for Trump's win
item.description: Former President Biden said he takes "responsibility" for President Trump winning the White House again.

item.title: Battle of the Shiloh Hendrix Fundraisers
item.description: The online controversy is a proxy fight in the culture war.

item.title: Trump calls Fed Chairman Powell a ‘fool’ but despite relentless attacks, he may be keeping him around for one key reason
item.description: Trump previously said he could remove Powell “real fast,” but has since backed down.

item.title: New Audio Reveals Planned Parenthoods Hand Out Cross-Sex Hormones To Kids Like Candy
item.description: Some Planned Parenthood receptionists hinted that a hormone prescription for the girl could be ready the same or the next day.

item.title: Exclusive: Meta in talks to deploy stablecoins three years after giving up on landmark crypto project
item.description: The social media giant is exploring how to use stablecoins to pay content creators, among other uses, according to sources familiar with the matter.

item.title: Where Was Democrats’ Outrage When Obama And Biden Deported Illegal Alien Housekeepers And Gardeners?
item.description: No one made a peep when Obama and Biden deported millions of illegal aliens who also merely worked hard, paid taxes, and stayed out of prison.

item.title: Netflix’s CEO Wants You Lonely and Miserable
item.description: The collapse of the film industry isn’t economic — it’s cultural and spiritual.

item.title: Jerome Powell says the Fed can afford to ‘wait and see’ before cutting rates. Other economists aren’t so sure
item.description: A data-dependent approach might leave the central bank playing catch-up.

item.description: Supreme Court Chief Justice John Roberts stressed the role of the federal courts in serving as a check on the "excesses of Congress or the executive."
